recipes.title: Espresso Macchiato
recipes.instructions: Pull a shot of espresso and top it with a small amount of foamed milk.

recipes.title: Cappuccino
recipes.instructions: Pull a shot of espresso, steam milk until velvety with small bubbles, pour equal parts steamed milk and foam over the espresso.

recipes.title: Caf√© Latte
recipes.instructions: Pull a shot of espresso, steam milk until creamy, pour steamed milk over the espresso.

recipes.title: Mocha
recipes.instructions: Mix chocolate syrup with espresso, steam milk, pour steamed milk over the chocolate espresso mixture, top with whipped cream.

recipes.title: Affogato
recipes.instructions: Place a scoop of vanilla ice cream in a cup or glass, pour a shot of hot espresso over the ice cream.

recipes.title: Irish Coffee
recipes.instructions: Combine Irish whiskey and brown sugar in a glass, fill with hot coffee, top with whipped cream.

recipes.title: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
recipes.instructions: Brew coarsely ground coffee using a phin filter, pour sweetened condensed milk into a glass, add ice, pour brewed coffee over ice and stir.

recipes.title: Flat White
recipes.instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso, steam milk until velvety with microfoam, pour milk over the espresso.

recipes.title: Turkish Coffee
recipes.instructions: Boil water in a cezve, add finely ground coffee and sugar (if desired), stir, let it come to a boil again, pour into a cup leaving the grounds behind.

recipes.title: Iced Americano
recipes.instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso, pour it over a glass filled with ice, top with cold water.
